mutants.original_line: return all(word[0] not in vowels for word in lst)
mutants.mutated_line: return all((word[0] in vowels for word in lst))

mutants.original_line: return all(word[0] not in vowels for word in lst)
mutants.mutated_line: return all((word[1] not in vowels for word in lst))

mutants.original_line: return all(word[0] not in vowels for word in lst)
mutants.mutated_line: return all((word[-1] not in vowels for word in lst))

mutants.original_line: return all(word[0] not in vowels for word in lst)
mutants.mutated_line: return all((word[1] not in vowels for word in lst))
